translation:
Most Illustrious and Excellent Sir

On the 20th of the current month, Your Excellency was presented with Lieutenant Francisco Pinto da Silva, who returns leading him to deliver to Your Excellency

God keep Your Excellency General Headquarters at Bagé, December 25, 1841. To the citizen General João Antônio da Silveira, Chief of the 1st Army Corps. Serafim Joaquim de Alencastre, 1st Deputy of the General Chief of the Army General Staff

Presidency of the Republic Secretariat General João Antônio da Silveira, Chief of the 1st Army Corps. Rosário. From the 1st Deputy of the General Chief of the Army General Staff.
